scripts.draft: npm run build_drafts && clear && bundle exec jekyll serve --livereload --incremental --drafts
scripts.write: npm run build && clear && bundle exec jekyll serve --livereload --incremental
scripts.minify: npx tailwindcss -i _site/assets/css/cv-screen.css -o _site/assets/css/cv-screen.css --minify && npx tailwindcss -i _site/assets/css/cv-print.css -o _site/assets/css/cv-print.css --minify && npx tailwindcss -i _site/assets/css/tailwind.css -o _site/assets/css/tailwind.css --minify
scripts.build: npm run build:jekyll && npm run minify touch _site/.nojekyll
